title: Over 13 Lakh Girls, Women Went Missing Between 2019-2021 In India: Data
selftext:

This is beyond ludicrous!!

Imagine the entire population of the city of Meerut all gone missing ЁЯШ│
Scary and people still think women have equal (or more) rights and freedom in India. Lol. :/
1.18 crore men when missing in the same period

> most of them were from Madhya Pradesh, followed by West Bengal.
